com.burstly.lib.component
Interface IInternalBurstlyAdListener

All Superinterfaces:
IBurstlyAdListener, IBurstlyRichMedia
public interface IInternalBurstlyAdListener
extends IBurstlyAdListener

This interface is used by Burstly sdk internally. It servers as an adaptor between internal logic and IBurstlyAdaptor interface.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
